Find Next

The Find Next option is a quick way to repeat the last Find you performed. There are three ways to repeat a Find:

  1. Click on the Find Next button on the Toolbar.
  2. Go to the Edit menu, then select Find Next.
  3. Press F3 (or whatever shortcut you have defined for this action).

For a tutorial on searching with regular expressions in RText, please see Using Regular Expressions.


See also: Find, Replace, Replace Next
